channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15744] Port over small format/text improvements from HBASE-13784
item.description: I want to close HBASE-13784 so I am breaking it up in smaller subissues. This issue addresses the smaller code/text improvements in the patch. They are trivial but it is a shame to have them lost.
item.summary: Port over small format/text improvements from HBASE-13784

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: These are the formatting updates and spelling error fixes contained in the patch
Fixes 2 spelling mistakes, removes some redundant access modifiers, removes some lines and empty comments, combines try catch statements.

FAILURE: Integrated in HBase-Trunk_matrix #885 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-Trunk_matrix/885/)
HBASE-15744 Port over small format/text improvements from HBASE-13784 (stack: rev 15631a76f5404728ee7f9683668038700f3cda4a)

  • hbase-client/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/ipc/RpcClient.java

  • hbase-client/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/RpcRetryingCallerWithReadReplicas.java
You are welcome! It did not feel right to leave an almost complete patch behind. (now in a new job) Looking forward to your review
